name: Happy Grumps
description:
A randomly generated, turn-based puzzle game about spreading happiness to a grumpy world.

Choose your hero


Each hero is unique. Your choice determines your range of movement, initial turns, and starting trinket. Unlock additional heroes through victories.

Explore your path


Each adventure is dynamic. Choose between branching paths, visit shops, face down difficult boss puzzles, and encounter mysterious strangers.

Discover powerful, rule-breaking trinkets


Uncover and purchase valuable trinkets on your journey. Find obscure synergies between trinkets to bend or even break the rules of the game.

Play at your pace


Puzzles are turn-based without a timer. Save up your turns for more difficult challenges or to purchase rare, expensive trinkets. Running low on turns and nearing defeat? Find a collector and pawn off your trinkets for more turns. Finish a run in a single session, save it for later, or abandon it for new odds.
